EmailTemplate.name: IAM_Application_Access_Removal
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account - Access Removed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The access to {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Application_Name__c} has been removed for {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Username__c} with the reason {!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Reject_Reason__c} - "{!IAM_Contact_Provisioning__c.IAM_Reason__c}" To regain access please contact your location admin or Cummins Account Representative. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
